data.question: What is the empirical formula of Tb-spn-MOF-1?
What is the crystal system and space group of Tb-sph-MOF-2?
At what temperature were the low-pressure gas adsorption studies of sph-MOFs conducted?
data.answer: The low-pressure gas adsorption studies of sph-MOFs were conducted at 77 K for N2 and 87 K for Ar.
